channel.title: [PI] Some Problems
channel.description:
I have a dupe on my server where if you do the special attack on the Morrigan javelin it stays in your hand and appears on that floor how would I make it delete after clicking the special bar? (this is with throwing axes to)
And pretty much I somehow managed to change the symbols for mods, when they talk in public they have a donator symbol instead of a silver crown. Admins and Owners still have the yellow crown but the mods don't, so does anyone know where to look or what to do to change this?
Also I don't know where to go change xp in a skill, right now its really low for wc. (Change without config.java)

item.title: [PI] Some Problems

item.description:
@omgitsbob12 wrote:

I did for 3 hours google and see there is no results.

Read full topic

@halflive9 wrote:

You go to the client section wich is under the server section and go to private client … and there is a tutorial. It’s probably not on the first page but search a while for it.

item.title: [PI] Some Problems
item.dc:creator: @omgitsbob12 omgitsbob12
item.description:
@omgitsbob12 wrote:

[quote=“halflive9, post:2, topic:428458”]1. Check out what happens when you click on the special bar. Find the id of the weapon and go to your special bar method and check it.

  1. There is a tutorial for how to add crowns in the client section.

  2. Check your woodcutting file.[/quote]
    I checked that it shows it deletes but it doesent, where is the link for tut and I checked my woodcutting file.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Some Problems
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

  1. Check out what happens when you click on the special bar. Find the id of the weapon and go to your special bar method and check it.

  2. There is a tutorial for how to add crowns in the client section.

  3. Check your woodcutting file.

Read full topic
